mapper.select: SELECT A.POST_CODE , A.POST_TITLE , A.MEMBER_CODE , A.POST_CONTEXT , A.POST_DATE , A.MAIN_CATEGORY , A.SUB_CATEGORY , A.VIEW_COUNT , B.MEMBER_CODE , B.NICKNAME FROM POST A LEFT JOIN MEMBERS B ON A.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE WHERE MAIN_CATEGORY = '자유' AND SUB_CATEGORY = #{ id } ORDER BY POST_DATE desc LIMIT #{pagination.limitStart}, #{recordSize}
